definition: to sit and await success or failure (idiom); to wait to see the outcome of a fight before taking sides/to sit on the fence
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: He remained neutral on the surface, but Actually he was looking on coldly.
sentences.chinese: 他表面上保持中立，其實是在坐觀成敗。

sentences.english: But I can't just sit back and watch either.
sentences.chinese: 但我可做不到保皇小遊戲坐觀成敗。
